sentences.english: From there, the Spain striker curled a shot into the top corner of the net.
sentences.chinese: 就在那裏，西班牙前鋒的一個弧線球直搗球網的上方。

sentences.english: This way both the net and her racket head protect her.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，球網和球拍給她雙重的保護。

sentences.english: The site is on the way to breaking last year's record totals.
sentences.chinese: 中國網球網勢必將突破去年記錄，再創新高。

sentences.english: Those are table tennis posts and nets.
sentences.chinese: 那些是乒乓球架和球網。

sentences.english: The custom at the end of a tennis match is for two players to shake hands at the net.
sentences.chinese: 在網球比賽結束有球員在球網處握手的慣例。

sentences.english: While the Web is all about information, e-mail is all about communication.
sentences.chinese: 環球網上的郵件信息都是關於通訊。

sentences.english: "He's a champion, " Mahut said after hugging his opponent at net.
sentences.chinese: “他是冠軍，”馬胡賽後在球網這擁抱了他的對手。

sentences.english: But what of the future?We are excited and enthusiastic about the future of screen printing globally.
sentences.chinese: 我們對全球網印業的未來持樂觀態度。

sentences.english: He played the ball back close to the net.
sentences.chinese: 他把球傳回到靠近球網處。

sentences.english: The pivot opens up his hips, letting him get his shoulders all the way sideways.
sentences.chinese: 通過轉體他的髖關節打開，幫助其轉肩側對球網。

sentences.english: Substitute Ricardo Fernandes lofted the ball over the keeper from 45 yards and skimmed the roof of the net.
sentences.chinese: 替補出場的菲爾南德斯45碼外掉射，擊中球網上端。
